item.description:
Meet us at La Festa for a couple of hours of conversation en francais.

Park on the street in front, or in lots located behind or beside the building. I'll wait for RSVPed members at a table just inside the door until about 7:15, or until everyone has arrived.

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast NH French Language February Meetup #2
